item.title: Government shutdown updates: Over 4,000 federal workers sent layoff notices
item.description: Russ Vought said in a social media post that the administration is making good on their threat of mass firings of the federal workforce.

item.title: Trump announces new 100% tariff on Chinese imports, after stock market sell-off
item.description: China imposed limits on rare earth minerals a day earlier.

item.title: WATCH: Dog goes viral for loving mom's music
item.description: A dog has gone viral on social media for loving his professional pianist mom's jazz music.
